thread.section_title: Smooth Hotel Rome Termini - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Really nice place to stay while visiting Rome -
thread.title_full: Really nice place to stay while visiting Rome - Review of Smooth Hotel Rome Termini, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: Mihai M
title: Really nice place to stay while visiting Rome -
text:
Really nice staff, nice and clean rooms (really enjoyed the smell of lavender first time when I entered the room). The breakfast also is a pretty nice addition.
It is a really good pick if you plan to visit Rome.
Totally recommend it!
